short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides compact view to your GitHub boards and issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Hides card "created by"
- Provide better focus on issue number
- Optionally hides labels, milestone and assignees
- Cards highlight rules (e.g. show bugs with red and my task with green)
- Move pull request to issue header
- Optionally hide issue logs and leave only comments
